text.text: The Dragon 32 was a home computer produced in the 1980s. The Dragon 32 was very similar to Tandy's TRS-80 Color Computer (CoCo) and was created especially for the European market by Mettoy/Dragon Data Ltd., based in Port Talbot. , Wales.
